participant_1.background:
My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.
I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.
I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade.
i enjoy movies about aliens invading the earth.
I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels.

participant_2.background:
I am trying to find a new job that will be a better fit for my personality.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
I am an Indian-American wedding photographer.
I don't have time to dye my hair.
I was a chef, but I recently lost my job.

content.text: Hi there! I'm looking for new friends to talk to.
Hello! I'm also looking for some new friends.
Great! What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy taking pictures, cooking, and writing.
That's awesome! I like to play guitar and write music.
I love music! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I mostly listen to rock and roll.
That's great! I love rock and roll too. What's your favorite band?
I don't have one favorite band, but I really like The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love The Beatles too.
What's your favorite song by The Beatles?
I can't decide between "Yesterday" and "Let It Be."
Those are both great songs! I love "Yesterday" too.
Me too! It's such a beautiful song.
I know, right? It's one of my all-time favorites.
It's my favorite Beatles song.
That's great! I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same music as you.
Yeah, it is. I hope we can be friends.
Me too!
